sentences.en: "Get the guy in the purple shirt." — "All right, my man."
sentences.cn: “把那个穿紫衬衫的家伙叫过来。”——“好的，老兄。”

sentences.en: Dave’s a nice guy when you get to know him.
sentences.cn: 戴夫是个好人，你了解他后就知道了。

sentences.en: David ran through the agreement with Guy, point by point.
sentences.cn: 戴维和盖伊一起把协议逐条看了一遍.

sentences.en: He claims he was made the fall guy for the affair.
sentences.cn: 他声称自己是这起事件的替罪羊。

sentences.en: I will always feel grateful to that little guy.
sentences.cn: 我会永远感激那个小伙子。

sentences.en: It's my bet that he's the guy behind this killing.
sentences.cn: 我认为他就是这起凶杀案的幕后主使。
杰克是个很厉害的家伙。

sentences.en: Johnny and Guy are the greatest unacknowledged pop songwriters in Britain.
sentences.cn: 约翰尼和盖伊是英国最了不起的、还未被公众认可的流行歌曲创作者。

sentences.en: Maybe this guy isn't so squeaky clean after all.
sentences.cn: 也许这个人说到底品行并非那么完美。

sentences.en: Sorry, Chris, but I have bad vibes about this guy.
sentences.cn: 对不起，克里斯，可我对这个家伙很反感。

sentences.en: The guy just loves to yap, and will do so at length.
sentences.cn: 那家伙就爱胡扯，而且一说起来就没完没了。

sentences.en: The guy's a chump. I could do a better job myself.
sentences.cn: 那家伙是个笨蛋。我自己做得都比他好。

sentences.en: The poor guy obviously didn't have any place to go for Easter.
sentences.cn: 这个可怜的家伙显然复活节无处可去。

sentences.en: The rap on this guy is that he doesn't really care.
sentences.cn: 这家伙据说并不怎么在乎。

sentences.en: There, directly below me, was a guy holding the ball.
sentences.cn: 刚好就在我下方，有个家伙手里拿着那个球。

sentences.en: This guy bore a really freaky resem-blance to Jones.
sentences.cn: 这个家伙和琼斯长得惊人地相似。

sentences.en: This guy, Jack Smith, does he go by the name of Jackal?
sentences.cn: 这个叫杰克·史密斯的家伙是不是还有个名字叫杰凯尔？

phrases.tran_cn: [美俚]替罪羊；容易上当受骗的人
好家伙（电影鬼娃新娘中的玩偶）
盖伊·福克斯（企图在国会大厦炸死英王詹姆士一世“火药阴谋”的策划者）
锤出吊货法；吊柱间绳索；吊杆稳索

trans.tran_cn: 男人，家伙，一群男人/女人，盖伊模拟像，拉索
